title: Post Deleted for Criticizing Riot Balance Team
body:
Title says it all. Though the post wasn't mine, I was one of the many people who gave their input and criticism on Riot current Balance philosophy. Amongst the many people who did comment we generally didn't have a good opinion of the balance team's philosophy, there were even suggestions as to how the game's balance could be improved through different means. In any case the post was removed as when you try to access it you get a 404 error with the League of Legends background. What this shows to me is that if you're employee's are such snowflakes as they are unable to handle criticism from your playerbase then what's the point of keeping them in their position? I'm not saying fire the balance team or anything, but at this point they are poisoning the game and slowly killing it by creating a bad atmosphere with the masses of people who play it.

Just some food for thought.
